name: Name Array Capping
description:
Create a method that accepts an array of names, and returns an array of each name capitalized

example
```ruby
cap_me(['jo', 'nelson', 'jurie']) # returns ['Jo', 'Nelson', 'Jurie']
cap_me(['KARLY', 'DANIEL', 'KELSEY']) # returns ['Karly', 'Daniel', 'Kelsey']
```
```javascript
capMe(['jo', 'nelson', 'jurie'])     // returns ['Jo', 'Nelson', 'Jurie']
capMe(['KARLY', 'DANIEL', 'KELSEY']) // returns ['Karly', 'Daniel', 'Kelsey']
```
ranking_html: 7 kyu
